app_title: === LENANEO LA NTLAFATSO YA TSAMAISO YA UBUNTU ===
no_root: Lenaneo lena ha le lokela ho sebetsoa e le root!
internet_error: Phoso: Ha ho kgokahanyo ya inthanete e fumanwang!
timeshift_missing: Timeshift ha e kentswe. Ha ho snapshot e entsweng.
snapshot_failed: Temoso: Ho etsa snapshot ho hloleha
update_error: Phoso ho ntlafatsa dilenane tsa di-package
packages_count: Palo ya di-package tse tlang ho ntlafatswa: %d
packages_list: Lenane la di-package tse tlang ho ntlafatswa:
no_packages: Ha ho di-package tse tlang ho ntlafatswa
install_error: Phoso ho kenya dintlafatso tsa di-package
removing_obsolete: Ke tlosa di-package tse seng sa hlokahala...
snap_error: Phoso ho ntlafatsa di-package tsa Snap
flatpak_error: Phoso ho ntlafatsa di-package tsa Flatpak
reboot_message: Reboot e hlokahala ho phetha dintlafatso.
reboot_prompt: Na o batla ho reboot jwale? (y/N):
reboot_later: Se lebale ho etsa reboot hamorao!
help_description: uubu - Sesebeliswa sa ntlafatso se iketsetswang bakeng sa Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) e etsa dintlafatso tse felletseng tsa tsamaiso ka ho iketsetsa.
E ntlafatsa APT, Snap, Flatpak, e hlwekisa tsamaiso mme e fana ka reboot haeba ho hlokahala.
flag_snapshot: Etsa snapshot ya Timeshift pele ho ntlafatso
flag_dist_upgrade: Etsa ntlafatso e felletseng ea sisteme (e kenyeletsa ho tlosa li-pakete tse khale)
upgrade: Ho hlola lintlafatso tse fumanehang tsa li-pakete...
